website_summaries.verdict: The Bose SoundTrue around-ear headphones offer a solid audio experience and a comfortable fit, but otherwise don't stand out against the plethora of excellent options in this price range.
pros: Strong audio performance with rich bass, crisp highs, and no distortion
Detachable cable with inline remote and microphone for mobile devices
cons: Not quite enough sub-bass for low-end fans

customer_reviews.title: Actually this is a very nice headset. Lightweight and pretty good sound
customer_reviews.text: Actually this is a very nice headset. Lightweight and pretty good sound. The problem I have is the audio cord. Bose has changed the connectors on both ends (from the previous model ("Quiet Comfort"). The end that attaches to the headset is now small and a strange proprietary size (not 3.5mm) and the other end is no longer has the 45 degree angle coming out of your phone to prevent the cord bending and eventually shorting every time you use it. THE HEADSET CORD IS RIDICULOUSLY THIN! My CORD DEVELOPED A SHORT after 5 months. Replaceable for $30.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Around Ear Bose headset at a great Amazon price!!
customer_reviews.text: P-H-E-N-O-M-I-N-A-LLLLLLLLLL Just arrived via Amazon Same-Day Prime (gratis).....bought these to replace some cheap low end trash I was using on my desktop. These Around-the-Ear Style fit perfectly with NO excessive pressure.....easy to wear for hours. Audio is excellent, highs and lows nicely separated with none of the bass muddy lows that many "trendy headsets" are notorious for. Cable has mini controls mounted to it for iPad and iPhone useage. Comes with a very nice Bose case for traveling or storage. This is NOT a noise cancelling headset but the great fit of the over ear cups shut out most noise in the home environment...... This is a great Amazon priced entry level headset into the Bose world.......!!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever
customer_reviews.text: Some people would rather buy a headphones because of the name brand or look. But those headphones are not worth the $$$$$. Bose has a reputation of producing high quality products. This product is no exception. I use this throughout my college career. I use this when I am at work and when I am at home. This headphones is always with me in my work bag. It is AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: vivi

customer_reviews.title: One of the best budget headphone
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for almost 4 years and I must say I am very much satisfied by the overall quality of it . I don't wanted to go over beats as they are way overpriced and wanted to own bose and i was not wrong. PROS: Light weight Good noise reduction sturdy material. replacement parts are easy to finds CONS : not much
customer_reviews.author: Amit Kumar kalwani

customer_reviews.title: Cat Proof
customer_reviews.text: The included cable is junk, output only worked right if I had the input jack in just the right spot. I was going to replace the cable anyway, my cat likes to chew on headphone cables unless they are braided. Paired with a braided cable these are the best over ear headphones I have owned and because the cable is replaceable these will last a very long time. Light and comfortable enough to be worn for hours. I am no audiophile, but the seem well balanced. The cat on the other hand is not happy with the purchase as his cries for attention go mostly unnoticed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Now that these headphones have been broken in, I've listened to well over 200 hours of music in them. I can wear these headphones all day and barely notice that they are on my head! Music sounds beautiful, every note is accentuated. Bass is clear, not shaky, treble is clear and crisp, and everything in between is heard in there too. They tend to block a lot of sound when you are listening to music, although they are not noise-cancelling, you will definitely be separated from the outside world. The cord does not work with android phones. If you get these you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Soule

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable & excellent sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Even after reading a number of reviews on Amazon and elsewhere, I was still surprised at how good these headphones are. They are extremely lightweight and comfortable, and the sound quality is excellent for the price. They sound better than my Etymotic in-ear headphones (though those have better sound isolation) as well as my Pioneer HDJ-1000 DJ headphones. When they are in their case, the headphones are very compact easy to carry. The built-in iPod controls and microphone are also excellent. Really the best combination of price, convenience, comfort, and sound for high quality general listening and travel.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hsu

customer_reviews.title: Buy these. You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a few years and they are still in mint condition. I use them often and the ear cups have not deteriorated. The sound quality is great, the noise canceling is great. I can’t hear anything except my music when I have them on. I use them on plane trips and can’t even hear the white noise of the plane during flight. They work great. Only down side is the cord is a little long for confined spaces like on a plane or in a car/bus but it doesn’t deter me from using them. These were a great purchase and excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Graham DeLoach

customer_reviews.title: These earphones are the most comfortable earphones I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are the most comfortable earphones I have ever used. The sound is acceptable and better than with average earphones (although not as crisp and clean as with The Beats). The earphones worked with my laptop, Surface, tablet, phone and iPad. Inside the package was the case for the earphones, the earphones and the connecting cord (that has a small remote on it to pause and play). The earphones are noise cancelling which is very useful when listening to music in a noisy place or using the earphones to facilitate a phone call.
customer_reviews.author: S C

customer_reviews.title: Bad form.
customer_reviews.text: This was a used product! I was not informed of that, It wasn't advertised as used. Guess what in order for you to know that it was used you have to open and read the paper work.. But when you open the package it is yours... Bad form.. The product works well but I was duped.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing. That is the only word for the all-encompassing awesomeness that is the SoundTrue headphones. They are so comfortable that after about five minutes, you won't even realize they're there. The sound is so real that at times I've had to remove them to make sure the sound wasn't actually playing through my speakers. They look a bit strange on my rather large head, but what the heck, I don't really care. I would highly recommend these headphones to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Coltharp

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, just wish the build quality was better.
customer_reviews.text: I've been hard pressed to find headphones that fit me comfortably as I have a larger head and these are the only ones that have worked for me. I can wear them for hours and barely notice them. Their sound seems decent but I'm not an audiophile. My major gripe is that the build quality seems fairly cheap. They look like they will fall apart quickly. I would like a product that is sturdy and sounds like the v moda crossfade lp but is also as comfortable as these.
customer_reviews.author: Kmaylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for our use.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife so she could make out the dialogue of t.v. programs better. We run this headphone from our stereo that is connected to the t.v. Made the comments/dialogue clear and distinct, rather fantastic actually. They are light and very comfortable. A quality pair of headphones for sure. I would buy again for this need. As far as the reproduction of music I can't address that, but all that comes out of the t.v. sound extremely clear. Perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced sound
customer_reviews.text: I owned other quality Bose products before, this product is no different. Build quality & performance are the best. High, mid & lows are perfectly balanced. I do not like headphones such as Dre & Monster that are heavy in bass but lacks highs & mids. I like the around the ear model better than over the ear because it's comfortable & cuts outside noise effectively. Wish Bose could have made the head band foldable also like the Sony for more portability. All in all, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nayak

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but stopped working after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were really great but they stopped working after 3 years of occasional use. The problem persists even after changing the cable. I contacted the Bose customer service and they are unable to repair them, unfortunately, so I'll need to buy a new set. It's a shame because they were awesome and I was planning to keep them for many more years!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Detachable cord is apparently a bad design choice
customer_reviews.text: Any slight head movement will jiggle the detachable cord where it enters the ear piece, causing the sound to go out from one or both ears. If I remain perfectly still the sound quality is actually excellent, but it's ridiculous to have to be so careful to avoid constantly readjusting that connection. These are too expensive for that kind of defect to be happening. I've bought a lot of great stuff from Bose in the past, very disappointed with the quality of these.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Yell

customer_reviews.title: very good lightweight headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones for traveling. Wore them over a 24 hour travel day overseas (and back) and they held up great and were very light and easy to wear. They sound good to me, better than my Beats, and are much more comfortable to wear. My head is large so the beats felt tight on my head. My only issue is that the first pair I ordered, the right ear cup went out within a day and I had to replace them. They aren't incredible sounding but they do the trick for me. My main use is travel, so that's what I am basing this on.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair for myself but my wife wants them now b/c the ear buds are annoying her lately. I paid more for mine so this is a great price to pick up an awesome sounding headphone. Everything is crystal clear and the music/tv/movies have a lot better sound than the buds that came with my phone. These work on the airplane and have a great carrying case. These aren't 100% noise cancelling, but they do a pretty good job. Great purchase and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MRAgency

customer_reviews.title: I have to admit I am somewhat disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I am somewhat disappointed in this product. I don't like the cord plugging directly into the ear cover. I find that it pulls out all the time and also the sound isn't as sharp as the on the ear pair that I own. That pair has a connector that hangs down for the ear cover piece. Having said all that I will say that they are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: owlfie

customer_reviews.title: want to return with out restocking fee  amazon prim should ban restocking fee for third party sellers and all sellers
customer_reviews.text: headphones not very good if you have any hearing loss like me will not have the vollium not very loud sound quality not like my old bose headphones more like raido shack seller has a returns restocking fee of 30% not happy wasted a lot of money junk do tot buy
customer_reviews.author: robert j brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and doesn't make my head hurt
customer_reviews.text: Covers the ears, bonus. Comfortable and doesn't make my head hurt, or my ears (I wear glasses). My only question is...where's the bass? Treble is good, but I miss my bass. Overall good quality for the price, and I've only used these to watch/listen from my iphone. Not sure if I'll be trying out the other features or not. For now, it muffles the outside noise so I can listen to music/movies.
customer_reviews.author: Joyness

customer_reviews.title: My Eardrums Love These Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones several hours daily. Great sound quality. Very comfortable to wear for long periods. The ear cups create a private world of sound, and because the quality of the sound is so good I can keep the volume low. The handy volume control on the cord works with my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Buy, twice.
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome earphones. I wear glasses and oftentimes I get headaches with headphones pressing them onto the side of my head, not with these. They sound amazing, and feel really soft. The only thing that I wasn't completely happy with was the SUPER LONG cable, I have to stash some of it into my pocket. It is completely removable though so if it becomes a huge issue I could easily replace it. I really recommend it; so much so that if these broke I'd probably buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Santos

customer_reviews.title: Lacks Bass W / Iphone
customer_reviews.text: The headphones fit nicely, but the bass is lacking when plugged into and Iphone, and you will notice it straight away if you came from earbuds. Whilst they are not noise cancelling, they do a pretty good job at blocking out noise since they cover the entire ear. They are comfortable, I just wish the bass was better.
customer_reviews.author: jungmen

customer_reviews.title: Truly the best headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the previous version of Bose around-ear headphones and they lasted me a good 7 years with fantastic quality up until the end. I just received these and they sound just as good and are a little smaller than the other pair. The only problem I had with the last pair was that the cord on the end that plugs into the headphones was specialized, so you could only buy the official replacement. These headphones have a universal connecting cord which is a fantastic improvement. Definitely looking forward to listening with these headphones for the next few years.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE over the new version and save money Best freaking headphones you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Unless you want the new colors, BUY THESE over the new version and save money Best freaking headphones you can buy. I work with music as a DJ and as far as walking around, or at the gym, or on a plane, these fit amazingly, don't fall off, are incredibly light, and produce sounds I personally would say are 10X that of beats or any others, for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but muddled.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable is about the best quality I can remark on about them. The twisting ear cup is nice but for travel I need something that folds up more compactly. The biggest niggle I had with these cans was their SQ. The mids and bass were alright, nothing special but I was left desperately wanting much more from the high's. The sound was borderline muddled in the 500hz + range.
customer_reviews.author: bret osborne

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable headphones I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Really love these. Most comfortable headphones I've tried. Gentle pressure and ear cup doe not put any pressure on your ear. Sound quality is good, but I am using them for Netflix and simple listening so this is not an audiophile assessment. Love that the cord is replaceable as that connection is the point where I have eventually broken about 3 pairs of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Alix

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones!
customer_reviews.text: My go to headphones for travel and other entertainment. I've worn these on long car rides and flights, they don't hurt like others. I'm no sound critic, but everything I've listened to with these sounds great. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFY...SOUND AWESOME ....with android device with music app with good EQ
customer_reviews.text: you can wear these all day without feeling that your head is in a vise. Sound is awesome. I listen to music on my old Samsung S2 with the POWER AMP music app that makes these headphones come alive. I had to ditch my SOL republic headphones because they were a PAIN to wear....but sounded great. while these don't have quite the bass ...they are real close.
customer_reviews.author: I. Sulak

customer_reviews.title: BOSE is the BEST.
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and soft, goes around the ear with padded head band. I watch TV in comfort and without distraction with these. Bose Quality as always. head band with just the right amount of pressure . I use 2 extensions to go anywhere in living area and not have to remove them. I would recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold P.

customer_reviews.title: Bose over beats.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I did my research and found these. For awhile I was thinking beats were the way to go but my research found these were just if good and better. Plus the prices are better and the company has been around making quality products a lot longer than beats.
customer_reviews.author: Julia D

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and useful.
customer_reviews.text: I had and eventually lost a smaller folding pair of Bose. Apparently those aren't made anymore. These are great. Comfortable for travel and for tuning out family clamor when I am working at home. Travel case is nice. But not as compact as my other set so I can't slip these into a purse.
customer_reviews.author: Book Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound; however
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound; however, Bose tends to have a narrow dynamic range that tends to be best in the lower, bass ranges. Otherwise, full, deep sound and no tinny notes. Good sound isolation that I prefer to the noise-canceling headphones. Does make my ears hot after wearing for a while.
customer_reviews.author: bobsie67

customer_reviews.title: Not just all about that bass...
customer_reviews.text: If you want rich, accurate sound, you just found it. These are the BEST headphones I've found, period. They aren't technically"noise-cancelling," but you'd be glad they're in your carry-on bag on any flight. They are comfortable to wear all day, the roomy over-ear earpieces can accommodate just about anyone's ear, and--most important--they have the truest sound of any other headphones I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: MaxWebber

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones but they are problematic if you try ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones but they are problematic if you try to lay your head on a pillow since they do stick out a bit. Overall wonderful quality and sound plus they do a decent job with blocking out noise.
customer_reviews.author: pick customer

customer_reviews.title: Helping productivity!
customer_reviews.text: These are marvelous headphones, and for a very good price. I work at home and need good over-the-ear headphones to cut down on ambient noise so I can concentrate. These also come with volume control and a microphone if you want to plug into an Apple device, but I'm happy with them on my desktop computer. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and very comfortable around my ears. My only complaint is that the cord is easily dislodged from the connection (lower side of left earpiece), so I'm constantly having to touch it to restore the stereo sound. I use these daily in my cubicle at work to help me ignore the noise around me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Bose
customer_reviews.text: My oldest son wanted a pair of Bose after his other ones went bad and these fit the bill. He loves these and uses them daily. He hasn't had any problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Familyties

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Great Value, Great Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I wear theses headphones about 8 hours a day listening to podcasts. Music sounds great too. These headphones are much better than the Beats Solo headphones they replaced for a much more reasonable price. Over the ear fit has been much better for me than the on-ear fit of the Beats Solo.
customer_reviews.author: chikinhammr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: BOSE saund very good we stil use them the cable had to be change once it needs BOSE original not any other type of replacement you will loos yore time and money
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Jusino

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product with Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I have had Bose products before and the sound quality is great! The previous ones were ON-EAR and hurt my ear after a period of time. Thes AROUND-Ear have solved that problem and sound quality is excellent as always from Bose.
customer_reviews.author: darwayman

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable, good quality earphones that I have ever used. I watch Netflix almost every night and also listen to a lot of music, and this set of headphones does the trick. Good sound quality without crushing your ears!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce J. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I use these when watching streaming video on the PC. These work well to compensate for my impaired hearing and to avoid raising the volume to levels that annoy my wife. The around the ear cups are comfortable. Were I to do it over again, I might have bought a wireless set.
customer_reviews.author: Cattleman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: As I've always experienced with Bose, these headphones sound great. The clarity and crispness of the audio blows me away compared to my previous beats studios. These aren't the headphones to buy if you want a ton of bass, but I think the highs and lows sound just like they are meant to.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Luedtke

customer_reviews.title: These are decent headphones but have a pretty weak bass response
customer_reviews.text: meh. These are decent headphones but have a pretty weak bass response. Once you set your EQ to actually get a decent bass level the distortion sets in ever so slightly and only gets worse from there. Decent for the price, but coming from Bose I expected way more bass presence.
customer_reviews.author: tyr

customer_reviews.title: sound
customer_reviews.text: performs as a Bose should, best sound in the industry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable and best quality sound I've yet used
customer_reviews.text: Lightest, most comfortable and best quality sound I've yet used! Some say it must be non durable because it is light. If you have them in your hands twisting and pulling them you would know this to be untrue! On the negative side I am not liking the I-Phone only inline volume buttons (I have Samsung Galaxy Note 3). You can only, therefore, use the pause button, but I knew that before I bought it! Small potatoes! Just buy, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pandy

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfortable and sound great!
customer_reviews.text: Light, comfortable, light and sound great. They also cut out a LOT of outside noise, which makes me wonder how much the "noise cancelling" versions of these really matter. I play the drums with these on and can hear very little without pulling my ear out partially from one of the phones. 5-star product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, solid, and great audio quality. It won't completely block exterior noise when the volume is low, but you can adjust that. The great upside is that no batteries are required. Comes in a fancy, handy case too.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: My very first bose headphone purchase and I was far from impressed. On full volume from my phone streaming and playing tracks off of the memory card it just lacked the pop I was looking for. The sound was balanced, but there was no bass at all. They are super light and very comfortable. I returned them next day and went with a bluetooth product that was much louder.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love ,love. I have always preferred bose and these don't disappoint. It did take me a while to adjust to the heavy feeling of the earphones as compared to ear buds. I do wish I had the 100.00 to make to make the jump to noise canceling, but these really do very themselves.
customer_reviews.author: abbey mccarthyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am no technical expert at breaking down my review into all the jargon. I love the sound that these headphones offer. I love the way I can hear each and every layer of the soundtrack (the several melodies playing at the back) and I love hearing my favorite songs on them. Its a whole new experience listening to my music collection on these. Very light to put on your head. My ears' cartilage didn't pain when I put these on for a prolonged time. I love my Bose SoundTrue Around-Ear headphones! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rajveer

customer_reviews.title: poratgil@hotmail.com
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, but the cord is ridiculously long. It gets caught on weight machines, vacuums or whatever you are doing. At a minimum they should have an option of ordering a shorter cord as an accessory. The tallest NBA player doesn't need a cable that long.
customer_reviews.author: G. Porat

customer_reviews.title: These are better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I tried an older version a friend owned and was not impressed. However, these new versions are WAY BETTER. I love them for a crowded office -- I can keep my music quiet (prevent hearing damage) but still stay in the zone.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great sound quality, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones on Amazon for $120 and i have to say it is so worth the money. I don't want to degrade the quality of beats, but they're overpriced by $50-$100 in my opinion. The bose soundtrue (in white) looks better and sounds 90% as good as beats products. If you're looking for low, deep bass i would look into beats solo 2 or beats studio, but if you're looking for crisp sound quality for a great price and an EXTREMELY comfortable set of headphones, look no further than the soundtrue.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Pleased for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Bose tested, lightweight, comfortable over ears, good sound quality for non-QC Cons: Major leakage, oddly shaped headband, cord too long
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: These headphones sound amazing and I still have them to this day
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound amazing and I still have them to this day. The chord is replaceable, but is kind of pricey. At least you don't have to replace tho whole headphones if the chord breaks. The chord itself is plastic and very thin.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Average, not up to standard for a Bose headphone
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good. Volume level is too low for me even in the highest volume setting. Sound doesn't crack at high volume. But again, volume is fixed at a lower level so sound doesn't crack. If you listen your music in a moderately low volume, these are perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are the beezneez lol really though, I'm glad I made this purchase. comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: HavnFun

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I use them at the gym, and when I travel. The sound is great, and they are very comfortable. I read some interviews that said people were worried about getting them sweaty, but I have not had any issues with them. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Been using variations of these headphones for years. The best feature is the detachable cord, which keeps me from pulling my laptop off my desk when I forget I am wearing headphones. The sound quality and the quality of construction are great. Last pair survived a long time. The reason I am replacing them is because I had destroyed the ear padding by shoving them in a bag with abrasive material.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stivers

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is WOW
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a difference these make in sounds. I've owned several big named, higher priced headphones but these blow all those away. I'm hearing notes I've never heard before in music that I've listened to thousands of times before. Well worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Tiellady

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! They are very nice sound quality and I can't hear people with them on nor can they hear me (Full volume sometimes). These ones are specifically for Apple products so make sure you read the details on what your buying but Bose is a great brand and these are amazing
customer_reviews.author: The Bibbs

customer_reviews.title: Bedside Sound
customer_reviews.text: First of all... They sound awesome. As a former Theater Techie / Sound Designer, I can't stand bad sounding headphones... I definitely can't stand BEATS (Brand is cool, Sound is horrible... except for the +$300 executives which are totally awesome and too expensive). These give good sounding Base with well balanced Mid / Highs... very crisp vocals. As far as anything under $200, I think this is the best sounding pair of headphones available at Best Buy etc. This pair is connected to my computer and sit next to my bed... it'll never see sunlight, and I hope they will last for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Wang

customer_reviews.title: Harsh highs.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable headband. Exceptional mid-range reality. Harsh highs. I read that high-quality earphones need to be broken in, so I hope the highs will smooth out.
customer_reviews.author: Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these excellent sound through a IPHONE or IPod, blocks out outside noise also 👍
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. Good comfort. Cable / Jack qualty not as good as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our son. Sound quality great. Comfortable. But just had for one month. Fell off bed stand onto floor and mic/cable Jack broke off. Disappointing for Bose. Will buy replacement cable but expected higher qualty from materials.
customer_reviews.author: Maine Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best head phones
customer_reviews.text: Bose makes the best head phones , there very comfortable, light weight and great sound quality. they keep out a lot of external sound. there ideak for healing music like bineural beats,
customer_reviews.author: Sacred Geometry

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable, I wear them to work or do homework
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, I wear them to work or do homework. I don't think these would be ideal for high levels of activity (running/gym/etc).
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best headphones for a person with hearing difficulties using a cell phone. My husband has tried quite a few and these are the winner. At last he can hear and understand cell phone conversations.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy2cat

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, not noise blocking so much
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality sound as usual for a Bose. They are not necessarily noise blocking. They will work on an airplane and will block minor noise issues. They fit comfortably around the ear and don't bother me for extended wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: great sound and quality for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pair for more that 4 years and they are still in good shape
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: we use this all of the time! if they ...
customer_reviews.text: we use this all of the time! if they weren't so expensive i would buy another pair for myself. they are truly sound reducing headphones. sometimes i put them on to fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Ellyn Dove

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy I purchased these. I feel like I got a reasonable deal since I was buying them after an upgraded model came out. Still getting used to the warm ears on my walk to the metro (subway). :)
customer_reviews.author: L. Beal

customer_reviews.title: JUST AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a day and the sound/bass are impeccable. Not to mention it doesn't even feel like I'm wearing them. There is absolutely no pressure. I bought other headphones on black friday and ended up returning them and got these. I am now a Bose customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: wes

customer_reviews.title: look no further
customer_reviews.text: They claim to be the non-sound proof, but we could not tell. Love these headphones. Very light. Seem to be a great fit on both my and my husbands heads, too. Worth the money. Beats have a tendency to tear at the wire connectors that go into the headphone piece itself. Bose is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Donaway

customer_reviews.title: most afforable bose headphones and great quality
customer_reviews.text: great sound quality, improved over ae2 model. nice flat black color. great price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Grant L.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended - great for office environments
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality and personally, I prefer this form factor better than the newer style. Comfortable enough to wear all day at the office and even though they're not active noise cancelling, they block out enough outside noise you don't have to turn them up too high (unless you want to).
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, sound is very good but not a "loud" ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, sound is very good but not a "loud" pair of headphones like Beats also, the pattern inside the ears of the headphones is stylish
customer_reviews.author: The Lord

customer_reviews.title: More than just a name.  Price and Quality are great.
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal quality and product for the price point. I travel a ton (100+ Flights a year) and these are my favorite travel companion. They are't noise cancelling but they are close enough. VERY Comfortable and great build quality. It's more than a name (Looking at your Beats by Dre).
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Norte

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sounding headphones. Not too bass heavy but that's ok. That's why they call them sound true. These are the most comfortable ones on the market in my opinion. Try to get them while they're still on sale!
customer_reviews.author: hunter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...  Expected Excellence From Bose!
customer_reviews.text: One side doesn't work at all, and the volume doesn't go high enough for my elderly mother-in-law to hear! Return process was painless though!
customer_reviews.author: Sally B.

customer_reviews.title: I like these better than the noise-canceling versions
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than the noise-canceling versions, which seem to hurt my head/ears. They're wonderfully light. They are certainly pricy, but if you can manage to find these on sale, they're great for casual listening.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Lesser

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Buy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones overall. The mic is on the left side of the headphones which takes some getting used to. The case is pretty basic, just enough to hold the headphones and nothing more. The sound is impecccable, nearly noise-cancelling for half the price. The headphones themselves are incredibly light, but are sturdy even though it might not look as such.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav K. Talwar

customer_reviews.title: these are amazing for the airplane
customer_reviews.text: Without dealing with the power or heaviness of the noice cancelling headphones, these are amazing for the airplane. For the price, they sound amazing still hide enough background noise to allow music/audiobooks at a comfortable volume.
customer_reviews.author: I S

customer_reviews.title: OK but not Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used this set to replace a worn-out Bose headphone set that has slightly smaller ear cups but its sound quality was noticeably better. These are OK with a somewhat harsh high-end, IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, case too big
customer_reviews.text: Sounds is good - comfortable. Biggest complaint is how large the carrying case is. Also, does not come with the dual plug adapter for plane use. Should have gone up to the version that folds up smaller for travel
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: not very fun sounding, or accurate
customer_reviews.text: Sound really tinny and hollow, not very fun sounding, or accurate. No bass presence, trebles are a tad too sharp at some points and fuzzy, and the mids are not prominent.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Love the crisp sound!
customer_reviews.text: Love the crisp sound, not too much bass for this "70s singers and songwriters" listener. I can barely notice them on my head...no pressure or weight. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: CWeath

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable headphones I ever used. Light weight, nice sound, comfortable and good looking design. The jack connector is too long though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey Mima

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Used it on a plane recently and ...
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I expected. Great sound. Used it on a plane recently and normally I can not hear anything on planes but with these headphones everything was clear as day
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: nice sound
customer_reviews.text: have to walk into my daughters room to get her for anything because these are glued to her head...she is a musician and enjoys the sound quality...
customer_reviews.author: bladenbullet

customer_reviews.title: Very clear and very comfortable listening experience
customer_reviews.text: Very clear and very comfortable listening experience. Nice and light on the head. Using them with my Roku remote and i phone and they work great for the price. No batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will have a better idea of how well they work but the music ...
customer_reviews.text: Bose, cannot go wrong with the quality. Once I take it on the plane, I will have a better idea of how well they work but the music quality through my Kindle Fire is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: agent210

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is on par with stock iphone ear buds.
customer_reviews.text: Expected better sound from Bose. On par with stock iphone ear buds, yet the around the ear feature cancels out more environmental sound.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Stupendously brilliant. Holy moly six types of cheese crap. Gorgeous, quality. Worth every effin' penny, for all that the price is frightening.
customer_reviews.author: Winter Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones, but I returned them. I ended up getting the Quiet Comfort 25 noise cancelling because I travel. Otherwise, I would have kept these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Henry Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable, with great sound and moderate noise blocking capability
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, with great sound and moderate noise blocking capability. I wear these to study, and they stay comfortable even on 12hr+ days. Also, they're light and small enough that I can carry them to the library every day without a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Moore

customer_reviews.title: Get Them Well You Can!!1
customer_reviews.text: This product has amazing sound quality, are far better then the expensive Dre Beats. These head phones are mind blowing !!!
customer_reviews.author: Zunedge

product_meta.title: Bose SoundTrue Headphones Around-Ear Style, Black
product_meta.description: Powerful sound, lightweight design SoundTrue headphones feature an advanced acoustic design for clear, natural audio across the full spectrum–from vocalists who hit the high note, right down to a good bass line groove. Go ahead, lose yourself in music. A softly padded headband and memory foam ear cushions stay comfortable no matter how long your playlist is. Convenience and durability More than a statement in style, SoundTrue headphones are designed to provide lasting quality. The audio cable attaches to a single earcup for greater freedom of movement and less tangling. It also detaches for convenient storage. The earcups conveniently fold flat and the headband is collapsible. And the included carrying case makes for easy transport while displaying your design choice. In tune and in touch SoundTrue headphones are designed specifically for use with your iPhone and other Apple products. The integrated inline remote located on the back of the microphone, lets you control music functions–adjust volume, play/pause tracks, skip tracks forward/backward, fast forward/rewind and change playlists. You can also switch between calls and music with one–touch ease–all without reaching for your device. Many features are also compatible with today's most popular phones.
feature_bullets: Full and natural sound for all your music
Softly padded headband and memory foam cushions
Also available in an on-ear style
